title: Nick Thomas-Symonds – 2020 Comments on Appointment of Chris Grayling to Intelligence Committee
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the comments made by Nick Thomas-Symonds, the Shadow Home Secretary, on 10 July 2020.
content:
The decision by the Prime Minister to nominate Chris Grayling as Chair of the Intelligence and Security Committee is truly astonishing. This is an appointment to a vital national security role at a critical time.
